name: Offline Explorer Queue File
summary: Learn about .WDQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When Offline Explorer archives a website, it downloads each file listed in the WDQ file until the queue is empty.

description: List of website files to be downloaded with Offline Explorer, a website archiving program; serves as a download queue that contains URLs of HTML pages, images, and other files from a specific website.
